printer.autodetect: No Autodetection features available, since it is a network printer

comments.en:
Flexible mid production system
The Oce VarioPrint 2100 is a scalable production solution that can meet your current needs and grow with you into the future.
Tab printing
Interposing of post-processed colour prints
91 prints per minute
Inline finishing
Speed upgrade to 105 prints per minute (optional)
Custom and oversized printing (optional)
Streaming PS/PCL (optional)
